title: Citi releases second quarter 2011 earnings.
summary: Earlier this morning, Citi released its earnings report for the second quarter of 2011. Chief Financial Officer John Gerspach discusses the report in this video. For more information and the full earnings report, visit the Investor Relations section of Citigroup's website.
